objects.name: GameDescription
objects.string: Park the car in the marked spot. If you crash, just press the screen anywhere with your left-click.

objects.name: AboutText
objects.string:
Objective:
Navigate your car using the arrow keys through the challenging parking lot, avoiding obstacles along the way.

Controls:
Use the arrow keys (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the car. Precision is key; avoid collisions with obstacles to successfully park.

Goal:
Safely park your car in the designated spot to complete each level. Be strategic, stay focused, and showcase your parking skills!
